name: TPS Prototype- Endless Shooter
description:
A prototype of a third person shooter (TPS) in the form of an endless shooter.

Character model- made on MakeHuman Community

Other assets- imported from Unity Asset Store

UI- made on Figma

Instructions:

  • Go near the weapons to pick them up.
  • Equip scanner to know information of certain objects and hack them if power is full (visible while scanner is equipped) and object is hackable.
  • If guns are out of ammo go to the weapon wall to refill.
  • Keep moving to avoid getting damaged.
